## â“ FAQ

**What file formats do you accept?**
RAW, JPEG, PNG, TIFF for photos. MP4, MOV, ProRes for video.

**What do I get back?**
High-res JPEG + full-res for photos, H.264 MP4 for video. Other formats on request.

**How do revisions work?**
Each tier includes revision rounds. Unlimited tiers = keep going until you're happy.

**Payment process?**
50% deposit to start, 50% on delivery. Venmo, PayPal, Zelle, and card accepted.
